question: 清い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>pure</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>pure</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: "In order to stay <vocabulary>pure</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>clean</vocabulary>, you shouldn't ever do anything dirty or bad. That is the <reading>key, yo</reading> (<ja>きよ</ja>)."
